I built this app to help me streamline my activities, while I gain back time. Now, I'm achieving more in less time.

Lap Quest is an innovative stopwatch app built with clean architecture and powered by Flutter. Seamlessly manage multiple activities, each with its own stopwatch and lap history. It is the ultimate companion for your activity pursuits.

![Lap Quest Gif](screenshots/lap_quest_gif.gif){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}
_Track Your Daily Activities To Improve_

![App Theme](screenshots/lap_quest_theming_gif.gif){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}

## Features

- **Crud Operations:** Create and manage multiple activities, each with its own stopwatch.
- **Efficient State Management:** Utilizes Bloc for state management.
- **Theming:** Switch between light and dark themes.
- **Data Persistence:** Employs Isar Database for efficient local data storage.
- **Modern Design:** A clean and intuitive user interface for effortless task management.

## Technologies Used

- **Flutter:** Developed using the Flutter framework.
- **Bloc:** State management with the Bloc library.
- **Isar:** Embedded database for local data storage.
- **Get-It:** Dependency injection library.
- **Google Fonts:** Provides easy access to Google Fonts.

## Getting Started

Embark on your Lap Quest journey by following these simple steps:

1. Clone the project from the [Lap Quest Repository link](https://github.com/eliascreates/lap_quest)..
1. Refer to the comprehensive setup instructions in the README to get the app up and running.

## Project Struture

The project follows a Clean Architecture structure to separate concerns and make the codebase maintainable and scalable.

![Project Structure](screenshots/lap_quest_project_structure.png){: .w-75 .shadow .rounded-10 w='1212' h='668'}
